text:
RELIGION

Sri Pundarikasha Perumal Temple, Thiruvellarai : Ratha utsavam, Perumal purappadu from Kannadi arai, 4.30 a.m.; reaching Vagana Mandapam, 5 a.m.; purappadu in Simha vaganam, 5.30 a.m.; reaching vagana mandapam, 6.30 a.m.; purappadu in tholukiniyan, 10.45 a.m.; reaching Yanai vagana asthana mandapam, 11 a.m.; purappadu in yanai vaganam, 8 p.m.; reaching kannadi arai, 10 p.m.

Sri Vishnu Sahasranama Parayana Sabha : Sahasranama parayanam, Varasiddhi Sri Anjaneyar Sannidhi, South Chithra Street, Srirangam, 6 p.m.; Veera Sanjeevi Anjaneyar Sannidhi, West Gate, Srirangam, 7 p.m.

Sri Rama Nama Sath Sangam : Sri Rama Nama parayanam, 54 I Main Street, SMESC Colony, 6 p.m.

GENERAL

Shri Angalamman College of Engineering and Technology : Telefest 2016 – valediction of ECE Association, R.Saranya, senior device associate, Amazon Development Centre, distributes prizes, 4 p.m.; Valediction of Computer Science and Engineering and Information Technology association, Bharath Mohan Rajendran, senior interactive developer, SapientNitro, chief guest, 10.45 a.m.

M.A.M.College of Engineering : Lectures on entrepreneurship development by K.Balasubramaniyan and M.Rajamaheswari, entrepreneurs, 9.30 a.m.

M.A.M.B School: Lecture on Neuro linguistic programming by S.Shanmugam, associate professor, M.A.M.College of Engineering and Technology, 10 a.m.

Ecole de Bambino : Annual day, Kingsley Jebakumar, paediatrician, chief guest, Hotel Sangam, 6 p.m.

Tiruchi District Kiddees Sports Development Association and VEPSA of St.John’s Vestry Anglo Indian Higher Secondary School: Inauguration of sports fest and inter-school sports meet, M.Asok, correspondent, SBIOA Schools, chief guest, Anna Stadium, 10 a.m.

Bharathidasan University Department of Women’s Studies and Department of Educational Technology : Lecture on ‘Education - an instrument for Promoting Gender equality,’ by V. BharathiHarishankar of University of Madras, Khajamalai Campus, 2.30 p.m.

Tiruchi District Tiny and Small Scale Industries Association: Facilitation programme on online vendor registration with Railways and Defence, Pathanjali, MD, High Energy Batteries Ltd., inaugurates, TIDITSSIA office, Ariyamangalam,10 a.m.

Saranathan College of Engineering, Department of Electronics and Communication Engineering : National conference on ‘Advanced Communication Systems and Signal Processing,’ 10 a.m.

K.Ramakrishnan College of Engineering Department of Mechanical Engineering : National conference on Latest techniques in mechanical engineering, 10 a.m.

Southern Railway Mazdoor Union : Annual conference of SRMU supervisor council, G.Eswarlal and S.Veerasekaran, speak, BTC New Auditorium, Golden Rock, 2.30 p.m.
title: tiruchi today
